fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Observe three players tonight. You will learn everyone who visits them. You receive each result individually.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You cannot self-target.
- If you watch an Unseen member, you will grant them Basic defense against direct attacks and deal a Basic attack to any attackers.
- You cannot watch the same Unseen member twice in a row, nor can you watch three Unseen members in the same night.
- Your visits are Astral.
